Subject: Assistance Modifying EPP Appliance Web Service
Description: Previously an engineer informed me that it is possible to modify the EPP appliance's nginx configuration so that the web service will turn on with only 1 NIC. Our internal architecture only allows 1 virtual NIC on a VM.
